title: Trump's longtime accounting firm cuts ties, cannot stand behind statements -filing - Reuters
content:
1. Trump's longtime accounting firm cuts ties, cannot stand behind statements -filing  Reuters
  2. Trump Organization's accounting firm says 10 years of financial statements are unreliable  CNN
  3. Donald Trump, Canada, Valentineâ€™s Day: Your Monday Evening Briefing  The New York Times
  4. Accounting Firm Cuts Ties With Trump Organization, Retracts Financial Statements  NBC News
  5. Tax firm Mazars fires Trump Organization as client, says former president's financial statements are unreliable  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The accounting firm that handled Donald Trump's company's financial statements dropped it as a client and said it could no longer stand behind a decade of statements, a court filing showed on Monday.
